Title: E
DC content rating system: Everyone - Appropriate for readers of all ages. May contain cartoon violence and/or some comic mischief.

Title: T
DC content rating system: Teen - Appropriate for readers age 12 and older. May contain mild violence, language and/or suggestive themes.

Title: T+
DC content rating system: Teen Plus - Appropriate for readers age 16 and older. May contain moderate violence, mild profanity, graphic imagery and/or suggestive themes.

Title: M
DC content rating system: Mature - Appropriate for readers age 18 and older. May contain intense violence, extensive profanity, nudity, sexual themes and other content suitable only for older readers.
